original_text: “These are the statutes and rules that you shall be careful to do in the land that the Lord, the God of your fathers, has given you to possess, all the days that you live on the earth.
korean_text: 네 조상의 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주셔서 차지하게 하신 땅에서 너희가 평생에 지켜 행할 규례와 법도는 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: These are the statutes and rules
that you shall be careful to do
in the land that the Lord, the God of your fathers,
all the days that you live on the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 땅 위에서 사는 모든 날 동안에
